# Problem 12.2 - Equations {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A point in a beam is subjected to the state of stress shown, where σ<sub>x</sub> = 12 MPa, σ<sub>y</sub> = 24 MPa, and τ<sub>xy</sub> = 6 MPa. Determine the normal stress acting on plane a-a if angle Θ = 25°.
